text: Update #Powercut we've got the majority of supplies back on in #MiltonKeynes #MK19 but are working hard to restore the remaining properties by approximately time. Apologies for the delay. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #MiltonKeynes MK19 to restore all supplies by 18:00. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #KirkbyInAshfield #NG17 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 07:30. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Portishead #BS20 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Portishead #BS20 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 02:30. Geraint
All supplies to # Bristol #BS1 #BS2 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #DinasPowys #CF64 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #BS1 #BS2 #Bristol area. We aim to restore all supplies by 17:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Bristol #BS3 #BS4 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut.  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #EX32 #Stratton now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #CF64 #DinasPowys & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 16:30.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Bristol #BS3 #BS4 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 14:00. Drew
Apologies for the #powercut in #Stratton #EX32 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 13:00. Drew
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Telford #TF1 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
There is currently a #powercut in #TF1 #Telford & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 00:30. Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Solihull #B90 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Drew
Apologies for the #powercut in #Solihull #B90 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 10:00. Drew
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Leicester #LE5 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Leicester #LE5 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 01:30. Andi
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Bristol #BS31 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
